version_description:
Relax Melodies for Apple Watch is here!
We are thrilled to announce your can now start your relaxing ambience right from your wrist!
The update also includes some stability and performance enhencements as well as some bug fixes.

Apple Watch Features
- Play your favorites
- Play a random mix
- Display your next alarm or timer
- Display your current selection
- Pause and resume your melodies

This update focuses on providing you with the best tools to help you sleep better

- New design
- Updated Discovery section
- New sounds
- New sleep meditation programs
- Bedtime Widget to remind you when it’s time to go to sleep
- iMessage extension allowing you to share your mix with your friends
- Support for WatchOS 2
- Mindful Minutes tracking with Apple Health
- Also includes some stability and performance enhancements as well as some bug fixes

Your positive reviews are greatly appreciated!
Don't hesitate to contact us through the “More” section inside the app to provide your feedback or request support!

This update is oriented towards simplifying your experience and ensuring a proper progression in our meditation programs to help up have a great night sleep.

- Save your favorite mixes now directly from the sound library.
- New Meditation display to better follow your progress and programs.
- Community Melodies is now in the favorites section.
- Now share your favorites with your friends directly from the favorites section.
- Submit your own mix to our content team and have a chance to see it listed in the Community Melodies display for other users to enjoy.
- 2 additional Nightstand Clock themes.
- Universal version now available in all iOS devices.
- It also includes stability and performance enhancers as well as some bug fixes.

Send us your comments or suggestions at support@ipnos.com

WHAT’S NEW
In this major update, Relax Melodies has been entirely rewritten for iOS 11, ensuring a smoother experience and a design compatible with iPhone X. We also bring you two more exciting features:

- A completely revamped meditation section with smarter content categorization and gorgeous graphics
- A brand new sound mixer allowing you to mix sounds and control volumes all in one place.
- And of course, we’ve taken care of necessary bug fixes.

We hope you enjoy this version as much as we do. Thank you for all your support and comments. We are looking to hear from you at support@ipnos.com!

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.
